BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB è davvero speciale, una creatura unica nel suo genere. Più specificatamente, è la gatta più incredibile del pianeta... e il suo gioco è stato creato con GDevelop!!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: Il gioco è un gioco retrò a 8 bit, bellissima grafica e colonna sonora, che si alterna tra livelli Platform, segreti nascosti e livelli di sparatutto con boss, molti nemici e bonus.
GDevelop è una piattaforma per la creazione di giochi open source. Può essere utilizzato da chiunque per creare qualsiasi tipo di giochi 2D.
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop è stato creato con amore da
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: cha hanno aggiunto funzionalità, corretto bug, inviato nuovi esempi, scritto tutorial e aiutato la Comunità.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Imagine and publish your games with GDevelop. Bundled with tutorials and examples.
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Per creare videogames senza programmare - Un programma di sviluppo di videogame HTML5 e nativi open source
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop è un progetto open-source (anche questo sito web): ognuno può contribuire e migliorare il software!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Ci sono diversi modi per contribuire a GDevelop, a seconda del tuo tempo, le tue capacità e cosa ti interessa.
GDevelop and the website can be translat: GDevelop e il sito web può essere tradotto nella tua lingua! Le traduzioni sono svolte in un sito web dove ognuno può partecipare.
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: It's easy to get the source code of GDevelop and start improving things!
Edit the website on GitHub: Modifica il sito Web su GitHub
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: The forum and the Discord chat are the place to get and provide help to other GDevelop users!
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Segui GDevelop su Facebook e Twitter:
For most beginners and even advanced use: For most beginners and even advanced users, tutorials and help page are the most valuable resources to create great games quickly. On the wiki, you can write tutorials or improve existing ones.
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop is free and can be used for profit or non-profit game making.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most recent Linux distributions. You can also try it online using Chrome, Firefox or another recent web browser.
To create your first game, start by read: To create your first game, start by reading a tutorial:
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop is an open-source project. You can get involved in the community to improve it!
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDevelop 5 is recommended for any new user as GDevelop 4 won't be updated anymore! No support will be provided in the future for GDevelop 4: we recommend any GDevelop 4 user to upgrade to GDevelop 5.
Even if GDevelop 4 supports native games: Even if GDevelop 4 supports native games, we recommend switching to GDevelop 5 and HTML5 games, which are better supported. Native games will be added to GDevelop 5 later.
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect opportunity to teach programming, game making and unleash students creativity.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop has already been used in classrooms and online courses, with digital media students or children in first grade!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Please send us your photos and tweets if you're using GDevelop for a course!
GDevelop is bundled with dozens of featu: GDevelop is bundled with dozens of features to imagine and create any kind of games.
Draw custom shapes on screen with the Sh: Draw custom shapes on screen with the Shape Painter
Support for custom collision masks: Supporto per le maschere di collisione personalizzate
Read the documentation for all objects: Read the documentation for all objects
Add behaviors to your game objects: Add behaviors to your game objects
Add realistic behavior to your objects: Add realistic behavior to your objects
Have your objects move and avoiding obst: Have your objects move and avoiding obstacles
create platformer games in a breeze: create platformer games in a breeze
quickly make your objects draggable with: quickly make your objects draggable with mouse/touch
And more, to automate current tasks and: E molto altro per rendere automatici i compiti correnti e aggiungere dei comportamenti in pochi click!
Read the documentation for all behaviors: Read the documentation for all behaviors
Design advanced levels and interfaces: Concepite dei livelli e delle interfacce avanzati
The scene editor lets you visually edit: L'editor di scena consente di modificare visivamente i livelli
Add interfaces and create parallax effec: Add interfaces and create parallax effects
Create your levels dynamically with exte: Create i livelli in modo dinamico utilizzando layout esterni
Integrated debugger and performance prof: Debugger integrato e controllo del rendimento
Make desktop & mobile-ready games: Create videogiochi per dispositivi mobili o per computer
Save player data in browser/local storag: Save player data in browser/local storage
Full support for sound effects and music: Supporto completo per effetti sonori e musiche
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Costruite giochi ambiziosi con caratteristiche avanzate
Communicate with external websites using: Comunicate con dei siti web esterni grazie alle richieste HTTP
Use advanced events: loops, for-each and: Use advanced events: loops, for-each and even functions
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipulate variables with arbitrary complex structures and even JSON support
You can even use JavaScript to code some: You can even use JavaScript to code some parts of your game!
One click export for Android: Esportazione per Android in un click
Export your game for the web in one clic: Esporta il tuo gioco per il web in un click
Export your game to iOS (with PhoneGap B: Esporta il tuo gioco per iOS (con PhoneGap Build o Cordova)
Publish your game on Kongregate, Itch.io: Pubblica il tuo gioco su Kongregate, Itch.io e altri siti di gaming online!
Export as a stand-alone executable game: Esportare come un gioco eseguibile per Windows, macOS e Linux

Made a nice game with GDevelop?: Hai fatto un bel gioco con GDevelop?
We'll love to know about your game and a: We'll love to know about your game and add it here. Make sure you have beautiful screenshots ready and that the game is high quality :)
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop è un game editor open-source e multipiattaforma progettato per essere usato da chiunque - non sono richeste abilità di programmazione.
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Unleash your creativity with GDevelop and create any kind of game: platformers, puzzles, shoot 'em up, strategy... Go through the examples or start a new project from scratch.
Create space shooter games with GDevelop: Create space shooter games with GDevelop
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: Quello che rende Gdevelop unico e facile da usare sono gli eventi. Gli eventi sono un mezzo potente per esprimere la logica del tuo videogame, e questo senza dover imparare un linguaggio di programmazione.
When Space is pressed, the character ani: When Space is pressed, the character animation and a sound are played. If a bomb touches the character, they both are destroyed.
Export your game in one click: Esporta il tuo gioco in un click
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Publish your games to the web, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux. Games created with GDevelop run anywhere and you can even do a one-click export to Android from the app.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Crea giochi per iOS, Android, Windows, macOS e Linux
Learn step-by-step how to use GDevelop o: Impara passo-passo come utilizzare GDevelop o ottenere informazioni su una caratteristica specifica: la wiki ha dei tutorial per principianti e una completa documentazione per il software.
